_header: Thirty-two teeth that keep full keen
_description: Mnemonic verses on the number of teeth, bones and veins — two couplets

BodRawPoe32.Transcription:
xxxij teth that kepe full keneCC bonys and NynteneCCC vaynys
                    syxty and fyveEuery man haþe that is a lyve
